response.original_title: Coldplay: God Put a Smile Upon Your Face
response.overview: Another day in the life of a common businessman...except that each movement he makes in between meetings and social encounters with friends or strangers turn into a dreadful nightmare where he slowly disappears with each of his limbs fading away out of nowhere and turning him into a desperate being. That's the concept behind one of Coldplay's greatest videos.
response.tagline: Where Do We Go? Nobody Knows
response.title: Coldplay: God Put a Smile Upon Your Face
